GitTagTable = OrderedTableRef[string, GitThing]
  Source   Edit 
GitThing = ref object
  o*: GitObject
  case kind*: GitObjectKind
  of GIT_OBJECT_TAG:
      nil

  of GIT_OBJECT_REF_DELTA:
      nil

  of GIT_OBJECT_TREE:
      nil

  else:
      nil
  Source   Edit
